H0.text: Therapods are the group of bipedal dinosaurs from which birds are thought to have evolved.

H1.text: Pteradactyls are the group of bipedal dinosaurs from which birds are thought to have evolved.

H2.text: Sporozans are the group of bipedal dinosaurs from which birds are thought to have evolved.

H3.text: Staurikosaurus is the group of bipedal dinosaurs from which birds are thought to have evolved.

A4.text: the evolution of birds from other theropod dinosaurs has also been reported

A5.text: birds arose directly from maniraptoran theropods
